name: Roller Coaster 3D - Water Park
description:
Roller Coaster 3D — Water Park: get all pleasures with this great combination of roller coaster riding and splashing in a water park!
Visit a wonderful amusement water park;
Control a bright, manoeuvre air boat;
Try all 3 amazing water park attractions;
Set the best water sliding record!

Rush down the slides as fast as possible, set the best time and become a new champion! Collect diamonds to unlock new donuts!

- Rush down the water slide
- Steer your rubber donut
- Try not to fall off
- Set new records
- Unlock new donuts to ride!
